=API for server-socket=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.server-socket))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#create-repl-server create-repl-server] [#create-server create-server]

===create-repl-server===
<pre>
Usage: *(_create-repl-server_ port backlog bind-addr)
       (_create-repl-server_ port backlog)
       (_create-repl-server_ port)*
</pre>

===create-server===
<pre>
Usage: *(_create-server_ port fun backlog bind-addr)
       (_create-server_ port fun backlog)
       (_create-server_ port fun)*
</pre>
<pre> Creates a server socket on port. Upon accept, a new thread is
created which calls:

 (fun input-stream output-stream)

 Optional arguments support specifying a listen backlog and binding
to a specific endpoint.</pre>
